data.name: BasicToolBarFactory
desc: The BasicToolBarFactory is a resource factory that provides (some of) the tool bars used by the Draw and Impress applications.
The factory recognizes the following URLs:
This short list marks the implementation of this service clearly as being in transition.
This factory is typically created indirectly by registering it in the configuration and have the XModuleController create it on demand.

methods.name: create
desc: Give the controller to new instances so that they have access to the drawing framework controllers.
